features: TRANSFORMING ROBOT T-REX – Watch your child’s eyes widen in amazement as they discover the hidden secrets this T-rex animal toy holds. By moving its pieces around, it transforms into a fully articulate and powerful robot toy.

PERFECT FOR PLAYTIME – This transforming toy is perfect for getting your little one excited for playtime and perfectly stimulates their imagination so that they can make creative play sessions when playing with our transforming action figure.

TRANSFORMS WITH EASE – Our robot toy is perfectly simple for children to transform thanks to its easily movable parts as and quality build construction. Then, it can also be easily transformed back into an animal toy when they’re done.

GREAT FOR CHILDREN YOUNG AND OLD – This t-rex robot toy has been made to be perfect for children 3 and over to play with. Even older kids will be able to enjoy the unique design and thought provoking transformation mechanisms.

MAKES A FANSTASTIC GIFT – If you’ve been looking for the perfect creative toy to get your child for their birthday or as a stocking stuffer, then this transforming action figure is sure to put a smile on their face and get their imagination running.
body.description: Forest & Twelfth Transforming 5" T-rex Robot ToyDoes your child love playing with intricate toys that let them tinker and use their imaginations?Do you try and find toys that can help enhance your little one’s playtime and also help bring out their creativity?If so, then we’ve got the perfect toy solution for you!Introducing ★Forest & Twelfth’s Transforming Action Figure★We know how hard it can be to find toys that are both exciting for your little one to play with, but also thought-provoking for them as well. That’s why with our 5" t-red dinosaur transforming animal toy, they’ll be able to spend hours crafting imaginative play sessions as they use their hands to carefully alter and transform this animal toy into a fun and exciting robot toy.Each toy has been made using durable materials and an intricate transformation mechanism that is easy to understand, so that even children as young as 3 years old can play with them and learn how they work. This toy has also been designed so that when your little one wants to transform their robot toy back into a t-rex they can easily do so in just following the same steps in reverse. Teaching them how to follow instructions and brainstorm all on their own.Need more reasons to choose us?✓ Great for expanding your child’s imagination and creativity✓ Easily transformable action figure✓ Ideal for children ages 3 and up✓ Makes a perfect stocking stuffer for birthday gift for your little oneReady to make playtime exciting again for your little one? Click the “Add to Cart” button and let our Transforming Action Figure become their new favorite toy, today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Horrendous, I'll Take Ten
reviews.reviewText: Forest & Twelfth have really found a pattern they like, seeing as every one of their transforming animals uses basically the same transformation with minor changes to how various parts are hidden. This results in a number of hilariously flawed robots with questionable design choices, but frankly I don't much care about that. These bots are full of character, and their animal forms have a far more animalistic shape than a good chunk of the classic Beast Wars models managed. It's debatable whether they're really worth an average of $15, but when you take into consideration that Hasbro's offerings in a similar size category run upwards of $25 the disparity seems fair. Definitely looking forward to expanding my collection of "deformers," if only because just trying to make them stand up and look presentable is comedically difficult.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my grandson's favorite toys
reviews.reviewText: My grandson is into transformers and when he saw the animal transformer, he asked me to get the dolphin. As soon as he got the toy, he would not want to leave it at home if we went out to run errands and it became his buddy to sleep with. Durable and easy to transform. I recommend this toy. Please make sure your child is passed the age of putting things in the mouth. Small parts on dolphin may come off and can be a choking hazard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Challenging for a 7 year old
reviews.reviewText: Interesting animal transformer. 7 year old likes it but the movement is a bit rigid for his small hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: For what was originally $15 became $20 by the time my son earned his money to buy it. It is extremely cheap, no directions and YouTube is not helpful for a demo. What we could figure out is that it doesn't actually transform into the picture... ridiculously frustrating and so a waiste of time waiting and money he has earned! I hope I can return this junk!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, but not easy.
reviews.reviewText: It took my four year old grandson and two adult men quite awhile to figure out how to open the shark into a transformer. But, now he's happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My great nephew loved it!
reviews.reviewText: Took my nephew and his wife and son to dinner. First thing my great nephew said was buy me a robot tiger? (He is 3) I looked confused because I had no idea what he wanted. So we pulled up Amazon and searched Robot Tiger and this came up. I ordered it and he LOVES it! Great price great toy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a big hit with my five year old grandson
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy and clever toy that actually is a well-designed stegosaurus model.
